title: Preserve admin gating UX while ensuring reliable re-check after access-code authorization

requirements.summary: Preserve the existing English Admin Access Denied UX and avoid immutable hook changes while making the Retry access check reliably refresh admin status after backend authorization fixes.
acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to any immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (including `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)` and `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).
The Admin Access Denied screen continues to show English text and provides: Retry access check, Sign out, Return to Home, and Enter Access Code UI.
After the backend fix, entering the correct access code and reloading results in the admin dashboard rendering successfully for that principal.

file_operations.description: Harden the existing Retry access check flow to force a fresh admin-status evaluation (e.g., invalidate related React Query cache keys before refetch) while keeping the current English admin gating UX unchanged and without editing immutable hook files.
